standards.name: Hypermedia Security: ARBOM Specification
standards.description: Arbitrary Risk Bill of Materials - Cryptographic attestation for arbitrary data blobs

requirements.title: Hash-Based Verification
requirements.text: ARBOM documents MUST contain cryptographic hashes of the data blob using SHA-256 and optionally SHA-512, SHA3-256, SHA3-512, or BLAKE3. Hash calculation MUST occur before signature generation.
descriptions: Hash-based verification ensures data integrity without storing the actual data blob. Only hash values are included in the ARBOM, creating a privacy-preserving attestation model.

requirements.title: Cryptographic Signature
requirements.text: ARBOM documents MUST be cryptographically signed using ES256, ES384, or ES512 algorithms. Keyless signing via Sigstore Fulcio is supported for ephemeral key scenarios.
descriptions: Cryptographic signatures provide authenticity and non-repudiation. The signature covers the entire ARBOM document including hashes, metadata, and component information.

requirements.title: CycloneDX 1.6/1.7 Compliance
requirements.text: ARBOM documents MUST conform to CycloneDX 1.6 or 1.7 specification with component type='data'. The document MUST include required fields: bomFormat, specVersion, serialNumber, version, metadata, components, and signature.
descriptions: CycloneDX compliance ensures interoperability with existing BOM tooling and repositories. The 'data' component type is specifically designed for non-software artifacts.

requirements.title: Single Data Component (POC)
requirements.text: POC implementation MUST contain exactly one data component. Multi-component ARBOMs are deferred to post-POC implementation.
descriptions: POC scope limits complexity to single data blob attestation. This provides foundation for future multi-component scenarios.

requirements.title: Metadata Requirements
requirements.text: ARBOM metadata MUST include timestamp, tools array (generation tool), and MAY include authors and custom properties. Properties SHOULD use 'arbom:' namespace prefix.
descriptions: Metadata provides context about ARBOM generation including when, by whom, and using what tools. Custom properties enable extensibility for domain-specific metadata.

requirements.title: Text Data Blobs Only (POC)
requirements.text: POC implementation supports text data blobs only (JSON, YAML, XML). Binary files and PDFs are explicitly out of scope for v1.0.0.
descriptions: Limiting scope to text data reduces implementation complexity while establishing core patterns for hash-reference attestation.
